content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Take a client email address (karl.fosaaen@netspi.com) and use Skype for Business to open a message dialog (Paste the email into the "Find someone or dial a number" box).
If the message dialog box shows the person's full name (Karl Fosaaen), job title, and/or availability (Online, offline, busy), then the client has federated Skype for Business.
You can use the Skype for Business VM and PowerSkype to confirm email addresses.

Karl has a VM with SDK stuff already installed
10.2.84.100
Corp-VM-Skype-Enum

Use AD creds to authenticate

Reference


https://blog.netspi.com/attacking-federated-skype-powershell/
